title: pazhanip-paNDAra
sahitya:
pazhanip-paNDArak-kOla azhagan daNDAyudanai tozhudu koNDADinAl tollaiyellAm tIrumE


anupallavi

  mezhuginaip-pOl urugi uLLam uDaiyOn mettap-parivODu tan bhaktaraip-pAlippOn


caraNam    harahara muruganE em ANDavanE uLLam uruga vENDumE aruL puriya vENDumE enru
paravashattODu kUri darishikka vandu sErum peruvAriyAna toNDar peru vAzhvaip-peruvAr
